title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Kyle's house, night. The Happy Chanukah sign is up and it is snowing.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: [Kyle's house, night, bathroom. The toilet is seen and on it
text: are a glass and a plate of chocolate-chip cookies. Kyle sits in his pajamas underneath a window and next to a night stand and candle opposite the toilet bowl, and holding a small flag which reads,

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: Ike walks in and towards the food]

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: He's gonna be here any minute, Ike.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oooh nooo, poopies.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Heee might not come if you're too close to the toilet bowl, Ike.  Come sit by me.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It's getting late, boys. Why don't you come on up to bed.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Just let us stay up a little longer, mom. Mr. Hankey's gotta show up. He always does.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Alright, bubbe.  Oh, and boys? Happy Chanukah.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Happy Chanukah, Mom.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Kyle's house, night, bathroom. "Silent Night" plays

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ayaaa ta.  Weee! Weee...

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Go away!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: The ant scurries away. At length, the candle burns down to the plate and goes out. Kyle and Ike are both asleep. Sheila and Gerald look in once again and find the boys asleep. Sheila picks up Ike and Gerald picks up Kyle and take them to their respective rooms. Kyle is then seen asleep in his room. He opens and blinks his eyes, then gasps and sits up. He rushes out of bed and into the restroom, only to find an empty plate and glass. He thinks Mr. Hankey has been by, until he notices something on the floor to the left of the toilet. A look of dismay comes over his face. It's the ant he sees, now bloated and content. Kyle goes to make a phone call.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Stan's house, night, bathroom. "Silent Night" continues

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: A-ah huh.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Stan! Go get the other guys and tell them to meet me at the bos stop in ten minutes!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ho-o-oh.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, night, bus stop. Kyle, with flashlight and crow bar, is waiting as the others arrive. Kenny arrives in coat, hood, and undies. Cartman in pajamas, cap and coat, and Stan fully dressed, but with his cap askew. A lock of hair is seen

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Okay, good. You're all here.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What is this all about, Kyle?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It's Mr. Hankey! He hasn't shown up yet.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Aw, Jesus Christ! I'm going back to bed.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It's only three days until Christmas, you guys! You know how bad thins have been around here. I think it might be because Mr. Hankey hasn't come.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Kyle, I have a full day of watching TV tomorrow. I don't have time to go on a poo hunt right now, okay?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: If you guys want thre to be a Christmas, you'd better come help me!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, night, city streets. Snow is still falling, but a manhole cover has been lifted and set aside. Down below, in the sewer, the boys walk in the muck looking for Mr. Hankey's home

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Heh-tchoo!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Dude, you sneezed on my back!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh, sorry, you might get some germs while you're walking around in human feces!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey, look.  Hello?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hoowwddyy ho!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: ...Mr. Hankey! Hoh, we were so worried! I was weiting up for you and you didn't come, so I thought that-

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh, no I'm fine, Kyle.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: But where have you been? Things aren't the same without you. Nobody seems to have the Christmas spirit.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I know, Kyle. I've just been awfully busy with my family.  Honey!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Family?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Boys, I want you to meet my wife. Autumn.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Howdy-hey kids!  Would you like a drink?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: They're too young to drink, honey.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey haa, it's Christmas!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Come. You have to meet the little nuggets, too. Kids!  This is our son, Cornwallis.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hoowwdy Ho!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Our daughter Amber.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hoowwdy Ho!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: And our son, Simon.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Eee, hey! Hnhn.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Simon's not so smart. He was born with a peanut in his head.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Heh What? Dad? Huh?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Nothin', Simon.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: A family! So THAT's why you haven't been able to spread Christmas cheer.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It sure has been tough. Nobody seems that into Christmas out there.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I know, it's like it doesn't matter anymore.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: My mom''s barely bought me any presents so far.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well don't worry kids! I'm sending the nuggets up tomorrow to spread Christmas cheer!  And if you want, you can help them.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Sure we'll help!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Anything for more presents!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: "Hic" Weh-hell, it's a Chrstmas party! Hey! You boys! You boys wanna bet me I won't take off my clothes?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Honey, pleh, you're- you're drunk. Onkay?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: but it's a Chrstmas party!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Honey, can we go inside for a second? Well, it's decided, kids. Tomorrow we're gonna bring back the spirit of Christmas!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, day, city streets. The boys and the nuggets stand on the sidewalk in front of Tele's and the toy store humming "Good King Wencelas" The nuggets soon hum their own tunes. Stan, Kyle, and Kenny wear nose clips and suits that suggest they are reindeer, while Cartman is dressed as Santa

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ho ho ho! Merry Christmas, you guys! Only three shopping days until-  God-damnit! Hey! Merry Christmas, asshole!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Nobody's paying any attention.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ew, I almost stepped in it.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, it was a good effort, boys. But I'm gonna have to close shop. Nobody's buyin' anything an' I can't afford to keep this furnace runnin'!  Oh. And, boys, there's some crap on the sidewalk there. Watch out.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Not one toy. I guess this yeear, everyone's content to celebrate with candles and love.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: This is hopeless. We're just gonna have to face that the commercialism has been sucked out of Christmas.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: A special report. Behind the anchor is a "No Christmas Trees" sign

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: And in other news tonight it appears that everyone is officially SICK OF CHRISTMAS!  In an SPC poll, 38% said they were fred up and tired of the holiday, 5% said they were indifferent to it, and a whopping 57% they would quick Bon Jovi square in the balls if given the opportunity.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, I think people are just fed up with the crowded shopping and the credit-card bills, uh.  I, I think that the holiday just has become a joke.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: You know, it's just that a lot of people don't really believe in the whole Jesus thing anymore, you know? So what's to celebrate?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh yeah. Right in the balls, man. Right square in the balls.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, the holiday spirit may be gone from South Park, but at least our faith in each other remains strong.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: In South Park.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh really?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, Cartman's house, day. The report is over

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Dude, change the channel. This is too depressing.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Good Grief! We need a Christmas tree for our play.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh, Jesus, not this thing again.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: How come everyone in cartoons has such big heads?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Alright, everyone, we've got to get on with our play!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Jesus, this sucks! All they keep doin' is dancing around!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Yeah, this thing really falls apart in the second act.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: And why is it that on Charlie Brown cartoons, everyone talks like this.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: My mom could make a better Christmas special than this!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey, that's it. Oh, my God, that's totally it!  It's so simple!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What, dude?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We can get everyone back into the Christmas spirit by making our very own animated Christmas special, and showing it to everybody in town!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We don't know anything about animation.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: How hard can it be? Look at it.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey yeah! We can make a little animated Santa Claus and Jesus, and it can star us instead of these little round-headed guys!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: (Yeah, right! Awesome!)

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Yeah! And we can call it... "The Spirit of Christmas"

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, The Mayor's office, day. The report is over

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ogh! This is terrible, Johnson! Our whole town's economy is going right in the toilet! We've got to get everybody back in the Christmas spirit!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Mayor, some adorable children are here to see you.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Meugh. Send them in.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Mayor! We have the solution to your problem.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: You do?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We're gonna make a short animated Christmas card that everyone can watch and and play it on the screen at the old drive-in.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It'll have everything. Jesus, Santa. And when people see it, they'll just HAVE to get in the spirit. All we need is three hundred dollars for our budget.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: An animated Christmas card. Kids, that just may be the dumbest idea I've ever heard, ever!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Awww.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: But at this point I'm willing to try anything. Johnson, cut them a check for three hundred dollars.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Alright!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: You guys go tell Butters to start making the cutoouts. I'm gonna go tell Mr. Hankey the good news!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: The Hankey home, day, exterior. Mr. Hankey and Autumn are in a heated argument inside. The argument is incomprehensible for a while, until a voice stands out.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Now you put that vase down! Put that vase down! That's a very expensive vase! Don't you throw that vase!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Ah, Mr. Hankey?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh, Kyle! Hoowwddy ho!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We got the money, Mr. Hankey. We're gonna make our animated Christmas card.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: Oh, that's swell! Kids! [the nuggets come out] Christmas is back
text: on! We've gotta all go get that old drive-in workin' again.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Okay!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: That's not the only thing we gotta get workin' again,  if you know what I mean...

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Wha- why do you, why do you have to say things like that in front of people?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, I've gotta go start our animation. We've only got two days.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Good luck, Kyle. And we'll have that projector workin'! Don't you worry!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What's the matter, Cornwallis?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Butters' home, day. A gate is open by one side of the house. Inside, the four boys enter a room littered with cutouts

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Alright, Butters. Let's see what you've got.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Huh, well, okay. Now, don't expect too much with the budget you gave me.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Yeahyeahyeah. just let us see 'em!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, alright. Here's a little paper construction of Santa Claus.  "Ho ho ho, uh, there-a kid. Hu-uh, would you like some- t-hoys and stuff" Hah, and uh, here's a little Jesus.  "Hi there, Santa. I am the Light and the Way, and stuff."  "Uh, ho o-kay. That's good, I suppose." Huh, and here's the cutout versions of you guys.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Whoa!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Heheh. Look, he made Stan all fat.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: That's not me, that's you!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What?!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: They kind of look like us.  I mean, Stan's got blue eyes and I've got a sharper nose, but I mean, they kinda look like us.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I AM NOT THAT GODDAMNED FAT!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: God job, Butters.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Woh, ah, hey! I made a little cutout version of me, too! Ih in case you need it for your animated film.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: No, that's okay.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: See ya!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Uh-m, alright, alright then.  "Oh, uh, hello, good-lookin'? What's your name?" "Huh, Butters, ma'am."  "Well, Butters, would you like to slap my- titties around?" "Whoa! Well, uhuh"  "Uh, no thanks, ma'am. Uh I, I'll get in trouble again."

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: The Hankey home, day. Inside, Cornwallis is seated at a table with thumb tacks for legs. There are two 5-book stacks on the table, a third stack on the floor behnd him, and two books on the floor in front of the table. Mr. Hankey enters, and soon seen are a spool of string for a bedstand and a pencil as a curtain rod. A locket hangs over Cornawallis' bed, and it contains pictures of his parents

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Cornwallis, we've got to go fix up the drive-in.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I don't want to, Dad. I'm too sad.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey, that's alright, Cornwallis. The boys' animated movie will being back the spirit of Christmas.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: It's not that, father. Its... Well, I don't feel like I'm really a part of Christmas.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: But son, you're a Hankey. We love Christmas!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Come on, it's time to sit around the tree!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We're having a talk, honey.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: God-damnit it's Christmas and we're gonna be a happy family around the tree!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Autumn, you're drunk. Alright, now, just go help the other kids; they can't get their stockings up.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: That's not the only thing that can't get up around here.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: ...Now come on, son. Don't be so down.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Why? We're just pieces of crap. Christmas isn't for us.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Christmas is about feeling good. That's for everybody!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I see the Nativity. There's angels, shepherds and sheep. But no poo. All the Christmas movies: Santa, elves, reindeer. No poo. I'm not a part of it.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: No, you're not a part of it, Carnwallis. You're all of it. Don't you see?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I'm nothing but crap!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: But crap is everything.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: Everything that lives on earth poos in some way

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: And that's how the cycle happens, each and every day

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Takes Cornwallis out and up to the street

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: Just look at the green green grass and the birds up in the sky

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: cows graze on the some exposed grass while large birds fly lazily above

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: It's all here because of poo, and now I'll tell you why

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: 'Cause it's eaten by cattle, which is eaten by women and men

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: A cow poops as it eats, then Butters' family is shown eatng burgers at table

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: It fuses with their bodies and becomes poo again

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Mr. Jankey sings to Cornwallis, then Butters' father is shown straining on the toilet

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: And that poo goes through the sewer, where it's dumped into the
text: sea.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: some poo descends through the pipe, and Mr. Hankey soon follows. A raw sewage outlet is then shown with Mr. Hankey exiting

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: And it's eaten by the plankton, and becomes the fishes' meal.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: plankton swarm the poo and devour it; a small fish eats the plankton

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: And then that bigger fish with the poo still inside

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: a bigger fish eats the small fish, but an even bigger one approaches

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: Swims up near the shore and gets eaten alive

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: the bigger fish swallows the medium-sized one and swims up to the surface, only to be snatched up by a bear

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: By the grizzly bear that poos on a dead piece of sand

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: the bear walks off with the fish in its mouth and poos as he leaves

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: So it can spring to life and become food for the land

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: flowers and grass spring up through and around it. The camera pulls back to reveal an African savvannah around the flowers, with all sorts of animals in it

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: It's the poo of the antelope, the poo of the giraffe

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: soft backup vocals come on, lending the song an African feel. antelope run in the background as a giraffe appears and stops

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: It falls onto the earth and becomes the blades of grass

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: The camera looks at Mr. Hankey and Cornwallis atop Poo Rock, first from the back, then from the front

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: The grass is eaten by the cattle, which comes out the other end

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: more cattle are shown grazing and pooing

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: To make food for the humans and start all over again

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: a man scoops the poo into a small bag and walks off; Butters and family eat more burgers; his mom sits on the toilet

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: [back on Poo Rock, before which animals poo freely] You see,
text: son? You're not an insignificant part of life. You are life.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: But how can I be that giraffe and blade of grass, and a human? I don't control what they do.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Just like your heart beats without you thinking about it, so, too, your giraffes and your humans do what they do without you even thinkin' about it. But it is all one life form. It is all... you.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: I think I see now.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: I'm the poo of the antelope, that flows down to the ground

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: steps forward

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Becomes the grass of tomorrow

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Yeah

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Which the grazers turn around

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: An antelope stops to poo a little, then runs off to join the others

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: So I'm the leg of a leopard and the wings of a hen

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Mr. Hankey holds Cornwallis high in the air on Poo Rock with the sky behind them. Cornwallis hums a bit

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: That's the Circle, the Circle of Poo!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Blink to black

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Stan's house, basement, day. He hands out scripts to the other three boys

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Okay, here's the script. But it doesn't have an ending.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: No ending? Well, we can't animate until we have our voices recorded, so we'd better just record what we have and figure out the ending later.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Okay, talk directly in the mike and don't hit any hard p's.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What's a hard p?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: You know, first thing in the mornng when it just won't come out?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Oh, yeah.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Uumm, okay, sound is speeding, and...

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We wish you a Merry Christmas

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hold on.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We wish-

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAA!!!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: ...deh.OOOWW!!!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Uh,  mmm. Okay, and?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: We wish you a merry Christmas,

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: We wish you a merry Christmas,

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: We wish you a merry Christmas--

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Hey! Wait a minute!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Aren't you Jewish, Kyle?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, yes, I think so.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Dude, Jewish people don't celebrate Christmas. You're supposed to sing Chanukah songs.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Dreidel dreidel dreidel,

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
role: I made you out of clay,

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Heheheheh, Chanukah sucks.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Don't you oppress me, fat boy.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Don't call me fat, buttfucker.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Then don't belittle my people you fuckin' fatass!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: You guys, knock it off! We have to record this!

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Dude, that was awesome.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: What's awesome?

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: The script. It's sweet.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: That's not in the script They do this all the time.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Well, it should be in the script. All that "you're fat" and "you're a Jew" and stuff. It's great.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: South Park, Photo Dojo, day. The boys are gathered round a camera, which is pointing straight down onto the poster Butters made for them. Two lights shine on the poster, and the cutouts are in place. Some other heads are at the top end of the poster

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Check it out, dude. The camera shoots one frame at a time. So, all we gotta do, is put the right mouth on, according to what syllable they're pronouncing at that frame.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Easy.

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
text: Yeah. So what's the first syllable?

text: Uhd- W, WW-e wish you a Merry Christmas

title: A VERY CRAPPY CHRISTMAS
